Text: Compiling and collecting them is not an easy task. You deserve credit. Thanks :)

I have collected this set too and never even dreamed of trying to seed it - yowsa.

You crazay CM
Just felt like giving back to a community that I've taken from so often. Even if it is just organizing and compiling stuff I've downloaded from other people.
Thats how we all started, soon enough you'll have a skull and be giving advice to the next new guy, just look at GH. Dont know where you came from, but keep it up :)

While i like the "skull guys" and all the work they do. It is a great thing to compile them into sets for those of us who would like to see the whole event but are missing issues.
Hats off to you my friend and i have saved you on my list to check in on.
so are these in like any particular "reading order"?

Should be in numerical order. If not read them in this order:
Green Lantern Rebirth
Lantern Corps Recharge
Green Lantern 1-20
Lantern Corps 1-13
Sinestro Corps War
Green Lantern 26-present
Lantern Corps 20-present
Blackest Night
Brightest Day
War of the Green Lanterns

Then continue on with the New 52.
